title: IFF Reaches Settlement Agreement With Carl Icahn
sub_head: Deal adds new independent director to big ingredient maker’s board
body:
International Flavors & Fragrances Inc. reached a settlement agreement with activist investor Carl Icahn that will add a new director to the big ingredient maker’s board.
As part of the agreement unveiled Wednesday with the company’s earnings, IFF is adding Barry Bruno, the chief marketing officer of consumer-goods company Church & Dwight Co. , as an independent director.
